title: Repair button moved?
body:
Has the league of legends repair button been moved with the latest chat?
Now when I select the settings cogwheel in the launcher window it only comes up with the options of "Allow Peer to Peer Transfer" and "SFX Volume" slider.

replies.body: I can't believe I didn't even think to check the question mark option. Thanks very much!
I believe it's in the question mark one now.
